name: Foxtrot (Wise Games Interactive)
description:
Foxtrot is a new multiplayer FPS experience. Pick a team and join the battle - only the best wins.

Note: Foxtrot is currently in Beta phase of development. 

Foxtrot has four classes - Assault, Engineer, Recon, or Heavy. Who do you prefer?

  • Assault - Rush into enemy line and kill 'em all
  • Engineer - Shotgun master
  • Recon - Just a sniper
  • Heavy - Man with a semi-automatic grenade launcher

You can edit loadout of each class. 

We have multiple game modes in Foxtrot.

  • Free for all
  • Team deathmatch
  • Capture the flag
  • Cover point
  • Gun rush
How to install

We highly recommend installing Foxtrot via the Itch launcher. Otherwise, you will have to download Foxtrot again manually when the update will be released.
